00053 /** @defgroup SPI_Exported_Types SPI exported types
00054   * @{
00055   */
00056 
00057 #if (LIBCFG_SPI_DATA_LENGTH_V01)
00058 typedef u8 SPI_DataTypeDef;
00059 #else
00060 typedef u16 SPI_DataTypeDef;
00061 #endif
00062 
00063 #if (LIBCFG_SPI_TIMEOUT_LENGTH_V01)
00064 typedef u8 SPI_TimeoutTypeDef;
00065 #else
00066 typedef u16 SPI_TimeoutTypeDef;
00067 #endif
00068 
00069 typedef struct
00070 {
00071   u32 SPI_Mode;
00072   u32 SPI_FIFO;
00073   u32 SPI_DataLength;
00074   u32 SPI_SELMode;
00075   u32 SPI_SELPolarity;
00076   u32 SPI_CPOL;
00077   u32 SPI_CPHA;
00078   u32 SPI_FirstBit;
00079   u32 SPI_RxFIFOTriggerLevel;
00080   u32 SPI_TxFIFOTriggerLevel;
00081   u32 SPI_ClockPrescaler;
00082 } SPI_InitTypeDef;
00083 
00084 /**

00086  */

00088 typedef enum
00089 {
00090   SIO_DIR_IN = 0,    /*!< input mode                                                                        */
00091   SIO_DIR_OUT        /*!< output mode                                                                       */
00092 } SIO_DIR_Enum;
00093 #endif

00098 /* Exported constants --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00099 /** @defgroup SPI_Exported_Constants SPI exported constants
00100   * @{
00101   */
00102 #define SPI_FIFO_ENABLE                             ((u32)0x00000400)
00103 #define SPI_FIFO_DISABLE                            ((u32)0x00000000)
00104 
00105 #define IS_SPI_FIFO_SET(FIFO)                       ((FIFO == SPI_FIFO_ENABLE) || \
00106                                                      (FIFO == SPI_FIFO_DISABLE))
00107 
00108 #define SPI_DATALENGTH_1                            ((u32)0x00000001)
00109 #define SPI_DATALENGTH_2                            ((u32)0x00000002)
00110 #define SPI_DATALENGTH_3                            ((u32)0x00000003)
00111 #define SPI_DATALENGTH_4                            ((u32)0x00000004)
00112 #define SPI_DATALENGTH_5                            ((u32)0x00000005)
00113 #define SPI_DATALENGTH_6                            ((u32)0x00000006)
00114 #define SPI_DATALENGTH_7                            ((u32)0x00000007)
00115 
00116 #if (LIBCFG_SPI_DATA_LENGTH_V01)
00117 #define SPI_DATALENGTH_8                            ((u32)0x00000000)
00118 
00119 #define IS_SPI_DATALENGTH(DATALENGTH)               ((DATALENGTH <= 0x07))
00120 #else
00121 #define SPI_DATALENGTH_8                            ((u32)0x00000008)
00122 #define SPI_DATALENGTH_9                            ((u32)0x00000009)
00123 #define SPI_DATALENGTH_10                           ((u32)0x0000000A)
00124 #define SPI_DATALENGTH_11                           ((u32)0x0000000B)
00125 #define SPI_DATALENGTH_12                           ((u32)0x0000000C)
00126 #define SPI_DATALENGTH_13                           ((u32)0x0000000D)
00127 #define SPI_DATALENGTH_14                           ((u32)0x0000000E)
00128 #define SPI_DATALENGTH_15                           ((u32)0x0000000F)
00129 #define SPI_DATALENGTH_16                           ((u32)0x00000000)
00130 
00131 #define IS_SPI_DATALENGTH(DATALENGTH)               ((DATALENGTH <= 0xF))
00132 #endif
00133 
00134 #define SPI_MASTER                                  ((u32)0x00004000)
00135 #define SPI_SLAVE                                   ((u32)0x00000000)
00136 
00137 #define IS_SPI_MODE(MODE)                           ((MODE == SPI_MASTER) || \
00138                                                      (MODE == SPI_SLAVE))
00139 
00140 
00141 #define SPI_SEL_HARDWARE                            ((u32)0x00002000)
00142 #define SPI_SEL_SOFTWARE                            ((u32)0x00000000)
00143 
00144 #define IS_SPI_SEL_MODE(SELMODE)                    ((SELMODE == SPI_SEL_HARDWARE) || \
00145                                                      (SELMODE == SPI_SEL_SOFTWARE))
00146 
00147 
00148 #define SPI_SEL_ACTIVE                              ((u32)0x00000010)
00149 #define SPI_SEL_INACTIVE                            ((u32)0xFFFFFFEF)
00150 
00151 #define IS_SPI_SOFTWARE_SEL(SEL)                    ((SEL == SPI_SEL_ACTIVE) || \
00152                                                      (SEL == SPI_SEL_INACTIVE))
00153 
00154 
00155 #define SPI_SELPOLARITY_HIGH                        ((u32)0x00000800)
00156 #define SPI_SELPOLARITY_LOW                         ((u32)0x00000000)
00157 
00158 #define IS_SPI_SEL_POLARITY(POLARITY)               ((POLARITY == SPI_SELPOLARITY_HIGH) || \
00159                                                      (POLARITY == SPI_SELPOLARITY_LOW))
00160 
00161 
00162 #define SPI_CPOL_HIGH                               ((u32)0x00000400)
00163 #define SPI_CPOL_LOW                                ((u32)0x00000000)
00164 
00165 #define IS_SPI_CPOL(CPOL)                           ((CPOL == SPI_CPOL_HIGH) || \
00166                                                      (CPOL == SPI_CPOL_LOW))
00167 
00168 
00169 #define SPI_CPHA_FIRST                              ((u32)0x00000000)
00170 #define SPI_CPHA_SECOND                             ((u32)0x00000001)
00171 
00172 #define IS_SPI_CPHA(CPHA)                           ((CPHA == SPI_CPHA_FIRST) || \
00173                                                      (CPHA == SPI_CPHA_SECOND))
00174 
00175 
00176 #define SPI_FIRSTBIT_LSB                            ((u32)0x00001000)
00177 #define SPI_FIRSTBIT_MSB                            ((u32)0x00000000)
00178 
00179 #define IS_SPI_FIRST_BIT(BIT)                       ((BIT == SPI_FIRSTBIT_LSB) || \
00180                                                      (BIT == SPI_FIRSTBIT_MSB))
00181 
00182 
00183 #define SPI_FLAG_TXBE                               ((u32)0x00000001)
00184 #define SPI_FLAG_TXE                                ((u32)0x00000002)
00185 #define SPI_FLAG_RXBNE                              ((u32)0x00000004)
00186 #define SPI_FLAG_WC                                 ((u32)0x00000008)
00187 #define SPI_FLAG_RO                                 ((u32)0x00000010)
00188 #if (LIBCFG_SPI_NO_MULTI_MASTER)
00189 #define IS_FLAG_MF(x)                               (0)
00190 #else
00191 #define SPI_FLAG_MF                                 ((u32)0x00000020)
00192 #define IS_FLAG_MF(x)                               (x ==  SPI_FLAG_MF)
00193 #endif
00194 #define SPI_FLAG_SA                                 ((u32)0x00000040)
00195 #define SPI_FLAG_TOUT                               ((u32)0x00000080)
00196 #define SPI_FLAG_BUSY                               ((u32)0x00000100)
00197 
00198 #define IS_SPI_FLAG(FLAG)                           ((FLAG ==  SPI_FLAG_TXBE)  || \
00199                                                      (FLAG ==  SPI_FLAG_TXE)   || \
00200                                                      (FLAG ==  SPI_FLAG_RXBNE) || \
00201                                                      (FLAG ==  SPI_FLAG_WC)    || \
00202                                                      (FLAG ==  SPI_FLAG_RO)    || \
00203                                                      IS_FLAG_MF(FLAG)          || \
00204                                                      (FLAG ==  SPI_FLAG_SA)    || \
00205                                                      (FLAG ==  SPI_FLAG_TOUT)  || \
00206                                                      (FLAG ==  SPI_FLAG_BUSY))
00207 
00208 #define IS_SPI_FLAG_CLEAR(CLEAR)                    ((CLEAR ==  SPI_FLAG_WC) || \
00209                                                      (CLEAR ==  SPI_FLAG_RO) || \
00210                                                      IS_FLAG_MF(CLEAR)       || \
00211                                                      (CLEAR ==  SPI_FLAG_SA) || \
00212                                                      (CLEAR ==  SPI_FLAG_TOUT))
00213 
00214 
00215 #define SPI_INT_TXBE                                ((u32)0x00000001)
00216 #define SPI_INT_TXE                                 ((u32)0x00000002)
00217 #define SPI_INT_RXBNE                               ((u32)0x00000004)
00218 #define SPI_INT_WC                                  ((u32)0x00000008)
00219 #define SPI_INT_RO                                  ((u32)0x00000010)
00220 #if (!LIBCFG_SPI_NO_MULTI_MASTER)
00221 #define SPI_INT_MF                                  ((u32)0x00000020)
00222 #endif
00223 #define SPI_INT_SA                                  ((u32)0x00000040)
00224 #define SPI_INT_TOUT                                ((u32)0x00000080)
00225 #if (LIBCFG_SPI_NO_MULTI_MASTER)
00226 #define SPI_INT_ALL                                 ((u32)0x000000DF)
00227 #else
00228 #define SPI_INT_ALL                                 ((u32)0x000000FF)
00229 #endif
00230 
00231 #define IS_SPI_INT(SPI_INT)                         (((SPI_INT & 0xFFFFFF00) == 0x0) && (SPI_INT != 0x0))
00232 
00233 
00234 
00235 #define SPI_FIFO_TX                                 ((u32)0x00000100)
00236 #define SPI_FIFO_RX                                 ((u32)0x00000200)
00237 
00238 #define IS_SPI_FIFO_DIRECTION(DIRECTION)            (((DIRECTION & 0xFFFFFCFF) == 0) && (DIRECTION != 0))
00239 
00240 
00241 #if (LIBCFG_PDMA)
00242 #define SPI_PDMAREQ_TX                              ((u32)0x00000002)
00243 #define SPI_PDMAREQ_RX                              ((u32)0x00000004)
00244 
00245 #define IS_SPI_PDMA_REQ(REQ)                        (((REQ & 0xFFFFFFF9) == 0x0) && (REQ != 0x0))
00246 #endif
00247 
00248 /* Check parameter of the SIOx input/output direction                                                       */
00249 #if (LIBCFG_QSPI)
00250 #define IS_SIO_DIR(x)                               (((x) == SIO_DIR_IN) || ((x) == SIO_DIR_OUT))
00251 #endif
00252 
00253 #define IS_SPI(x)                                   (IS_SPI0(x) || IS_SPI1(x))
00254 #define IS_SPI0(x)                                  (x == HT_SPI0)
00255 #if (LIBCFG_SPI1)
00256 #define IS_SPI1(x)                                  (x == HT_SPI1)
00257 #else
00258 #define IS_SPI1(x)                                  (0)
00259 #endif
00260 #if (LIBCFG_QSPI)
00261 #define IS_QSPI(x)                                  (x == HT_QSPI)
00262 #else
00263 #define IS_QSPI(x)                                  (0)
00264 #endif
00265 
00266 #if (LIBCFG_SPI_DATA_LENGTH_V01)
00267 #define IS_SPI_DATA(DATA)                           (DATA <= 0xff)
00268 #else
00269 #define IS_SPI_DATA(DATA)                           (DATA <= 0xffff)
00270 #endif
00271 
00272 #if (LIBCFG_SPI_FIFO_DEPTH_V01)
00273 #define IS_SPI_FIFO_LEVEL(LEVEL)                    (LEVEL <= 4)
00274 #else
00275 #define IS_SPI_FIFO_LEVEL(LEVEL)                    (LEVEL <= 8)
00276 #endif
00277 
00278 #define IS_SPI_CLOCK_PRESCALER(PRESCALER)           (PRESCALER >= 2)
00279 
00280 #define SPI_GUADTIME_1_SCK                          ((u16)0x0000)
00281 #define SPI_GUADTIME_2_SCK                          ((u16)0x0001)

00290 #define SPI_GUADTIME_11_SCK                         ((u16)0x000A)

00292 #define SPI_GUADTIME_13_SCK                         ((u16)0x000C)

00300 #define SPI_SELHOLDTIME_HALF_SCK                    ((u16)0x0000)
00301 #define SPI_SELHOLDTIME_1_SCK                       ((u16)0x0001)
00302 #define SPI_SELHOLDTIME_1_HALF_SCK                  ((u16)0x0002)
00303 #define SPI_SELHOLDTIME_2_SCK                       ((u16)0x0003)
00304 #define SPI_SELHOLDTIME_2_HALF_SCK                  ((u16)0x0004)
